# applications

**Instance Property**

A set of application instances selected by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
var applications: Set<Application> { get }
```

## Accessing Selected Applications

- **applicationTokens**: Tokens that represent applications selected by the user.

items.description: Tokens that represent applications selected by the user.
items.name: applicationTokens
